title: 自定义村民商店问题
author: qadds
txt_content:
本帖最后由 qadds 于 2020-5-15 21:53 编辑 

https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-460974-1-1.html
用了这个插件之后发现玩家无法正常使用村民蛋生成村民
如何让正常生成的村民（刷出来和刷怪蛋出来的村民）变回正常的  就是能正常走能正常工作的   

服务器版本1.14.4  

急求在线等


附配置文件

- Has unlimited stock.
- Insert items from your inventory.
- Left/Right click to adjust amounts.

- Sells items to players.
- Insert items to sell into the chest.
- Left/Right click to adjust amounts.
- 'Top row: Items being sold'
- 'Bottom rows: Cost items'
msg-trade-setup-desc-buying:
- Buys items from players.
- Insert one of each item you want to
- buy and plenty of currency items
- into the chest.
- Left/Right click to adjust amounts.
- 'Top row: Cost items'
- 'Bottom row: Items being bought'
msg-trade-setup-desc-trading:
- Trades items with players.
- Pickup an item from your inventory
- and then click a slot to place it.
- Left/Right click to adjust amounts.
- 'Top row: Result items'
- 'Bottom rows: Cost items'

- Sells book copies.
- Insert written and blank books
- into the chest.
- Left/Right click to adjust costs.
- 'Top row: Books being sold'
- 'Bottom rows: Cost items'

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
你把
shop-creation-item: VILLAGER_SPAWN_EGG
这个改掉就行了
改成BEDROCK这种玩家拿不到的东西

shop-creation-item: BEDROCK

replies.author: one_
replies.txt_content:
我是用着没有问题
你删除后看看会不会出现不会走动的现象

replies.author: qadds
replies.txt_content:
one_ 发表于 2020-5-15 21:51
我是用着没有问题
你删除后看看会不会出现不会走动的现象
我的是玩家用刷怪蛋生成村民的时候系统提示选择村民商店类型 
然而我不希望这样 我希望村民刷怪蛋生成的就是普普通通的村民....

replies.author: one_
replies.txt_content:
qadds 发表于 2020-5-15 21:54
我的是玩家用刷怪蛋生成村民的时候系统提示选择村民商店类型 
然而我不希望这样 我希望村民刷怪蛋生成的 ...
将disable-other-villagers后面改成false试试

replies.author: qadds
replies.txt_content:
one_ 发表于 2020-5-15 21:58
将disable-other-villagers后面改成false试试
我的就是FALSE  上传的配置文件里面有

replies.author: one_
replies.txt_content:
qadds 发表于 2020-5-15 22:00
我的就是FALSE  上传的配置文件里面有
是否有给玩家shopkeeper.player权限

replies.author: 阿奇!
replies.txt_content: disable-other-villagers: true #是否禁用其他村民功能(原版MC的村民) 把这个改成false

replies.author: one_
replies.txt_content:
直接关闭村民商店吧，用牌子商店或者是巫师商店
enable-villager-shops后面改为false

replies.txt_content:
